snippet: Officials released new details about the killing of a Palestinian youth, saying that three Israeli Jews looked for hours for a victim to avenge the killings of three Israeli teenagers.
abstract: Israeli officials release new details about the killing of Palestinian youth Muhammad Abu Khdeir, saying that three Israeli Jews looked for hours for a victim to avenge the killings of three Israeli teenagers; say they planned murder and were equipped with handcuffs and gasoline; killings have sent shockwaves around world, but have also brought out humanity in people on both sides of conflict.
lead_paragraph: Officials released new details about the killing of a Palestinian youth, saying that three Israeli Jews looked for hours for a victim to avenge the killings of three Israeli teenagers.

headline.main: A Focused Hunt for a Victim to Avenge Israelis’ Deaths
headline.print_headline: A Boy Set Ablaze: Details Emerging in a Revenge Case
